title: Full Hebrew translation audit — all windows, modals, and components
description: Audit every screen, modal, drawer, and component in the app for untranslated or hardcoded strings. Every piece of user-facing text must support Hebrew via i18n. This is a comprehensive sweep — not just new additions but the entire existing codebase.
scope: All modals (confirmation dialogs, detail modals, create/edit forms)
All hub components (ShoppingHub, TasksHub, VouchersHub, etc.)
All card components (VoucherCard, ReservationCard, TaskCard, etc.)
All form components (create, edit, delete confirmation)
All empty states and loading states
All error messages and toast notifications
All button labels, placeholders, and aria labels
AuthScreen — sign in, sign up, join household flows
approach: 1. Run: grep -r 'className\|return\|<' src/components src/pages --include='*.tsx' to find hardcoded strings
2. For each component: identify all visible strings not wrapped in t()
5. Replace hardcoded strings with t('namespace:key') calls
6. Use existing namespaces where appropriate: common, shopping, tasks, vouchers, reservations, settings
7. Create new namespaces only if needed (e.g. auth)
conventions: No hardcoded user-facing strings in JSX — all through t()
Pluralization via i18next _one/_other keys where needed
RTL-safe — logical Tailwind properties only (ms-, me-, ps-, pe-)
Do not translate: brand names (BuyMe, Ontopo), technical strings, console logs
acceptance_criteria: Zero hardcoded user-facing strings in any component
All i18n/he/ files have a matching key for every i18n/en/ key
App fully usable in Hebrew — no English strings visible when language is set to Hebrew
notes: fe-bug-003 through fe-bug-015 are resolved and merged. This task is READY TO START. Pay special attention to hardcoded strings in src/utils/contextMapping.ts, src/utils/he/contextMapping.ts, src/utils/suggestions.ts, src/utils/contextResolver.ts — these contain listCategory values and category display strings that are rendered in the UI but may not go through t(). Also audit AddVoucherModal, AddReservationModal, VouchersHub, ReservationsHub — these were recently added and may have untranslated strings. See fe-009 for the companion task covering data-driven category/listCategory values specifically.
